languages.text: "Просто оно оказалось поумнее некоторых, правда, Идира, шерин?"
"It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Просто оно оказалось поумнее некоторых, правда, Идира, шерин?"

traits.locale_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

languages.text: 「たまたま他のヤツらよりデキがいいんだろ。どうだい、イディラ？」
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: 「たまたま他のヤツらよりデキがいいんだろ。どうだい、イディラ？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “它只是碰巧比它的同类更聪明罢了。不是吗，伊迪拉？”
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: “它只是碰巧比它的同类更聪明罢了。不是吗，伊迪拉？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Cette créature était juste plus maligne que les autres. N'est-ce pas, Idira ? »
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: « Cette créature était juste plus maligne que les autres. N'est-ce pas, Idira ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Solo resulta que es más lista que las demás. ¿Verdad que sí, Idira?».
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo resulta que es más lista que las demás. ¿Verdad que sí, Idira?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Sie scheint klüger zu sein als die anderen. Ist es nicht so, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie scheint klüger zu sein als die anderen. Ist es nicht so, Idira?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Diğerlerinden daha akıllı çıkmış yani. Haksız mıyım İdira?"
languages.original_text: "It just happened to be smarter than the others. Isn't that right, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Diğerlerinden daha akıllı çıkmış yani. Haksız mıyım İdira?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
